AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.introduction-description: Hi! I’m Valeriia, a frontend developer with experience in React, TypeScript, and Next.js. I enjoy creating beautiful and user-friendly web interfaces where design meets functionality.
AboutMe.skills-description: My tech stack includes JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, styled-components, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Redux Toolkit, Zustand, RTK Query, React Hook Form, Zod, Bootstrap, MUI, and Tailwind. I also work with Git and Figma and have experience with responsive and cross-browser layouts.

Experience.description: Worked on two commercial projects using Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux. Developed user interfaces, implemented responsive layouts, created a UI kit, configured routing, and integrated front-end functionality with the back-end.

Contributed to a commercial project using Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux. Implemented user interfaces, configured routes, utilized component libraries (MUI), and collaborated with the back-end team for server integration.
